mapper.select: select assets_re_id from p10_expense_record_assets_re where expense_record_id = #{expenseRecordId}

select p10_assets_re.*,p10_assets.assets_name,p10_assets.assets_type,p10_assets.`owner`,p10_assets.account_number,p10_address.province,p10_address.city,p10_address.area,p10_address.information_address,p10_address.`code`,p10_address.address_id from p10_expense_record_assets_re left join p10_assets_re on p10_assets_re.assets_re_id = p10_expense_record_assets_re.assets_re_id left join p10_assets on p10_assets.assets_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id left join p10_address on p10_address.user_id = p10_assets.assets_id and p10_address.type = 4 where p10_expense_record_assets_re.expense_record_id = #{expenseRecordId}
